headline: Dover Fueling Solutions Launches 4Court Media, Giving Advertisers and Retailers a New Way to Engage Consumers at the Fuel Dispenser
summary: Dover Fueling Solutions ("DFS"), a part of Dover (NYSE: DOV) and a leading global provider of advanced customer-focused technologies, services and solutions in the fuel and convenience retail industries, today announced the launch of 4Court Media™, a retail media network designed to connect brands with consumers at the fuel dispenser.
